hey, i'm taneisha. currently completing a degree in astronomy and physics at the university of toronto. in my spare time i practice the ins and outs of web development on my own. my goal in this life is to have a career in software development. my dream would be to combine my knowledge of physics with my love of computers to develop useful solutions for all people across the world!
